question: My dad had a brain  stroke three years ago..He was frustrated with diabetes and blood pressure.He is having trouble managing nausea vs. balance.The medicines were not helping him.after 8months he was recovered about 80% but suddenly he was catch up with another stroke now he is not able speak,walk,listen he is not able to give any reaction also.he is also paralyzed on left side. he is confined to bed so suggest me proper treatment so that he will recover soon.
title: stroke
